Index.slogan: We deliver custom retail fixtures with precision engineering, providing tailored insights that optimize your project from start to finish. Our goal is simple: maximize value and impact for your brand.

About.headerTitle: Beyond Manufacturing â€” Your Partner in Precision Engineering and Innovation.
About.yearExperience: COMBINED OFFICE, FACTORY, AND WAREHOUSE SPACE (SQ. METERS)
About.industrialExperienceDescription: With 20 years of experience, we deliver custom solutions that optimize your manufacturing process, ensuring high-quality products while reducing costs and lead times.
About.oneStopServiceDescription: With our satellite supply chain, we offer a seamless, one-stop manufacturing service, even without owning every production line. This strategy is key to reducing lead times and ensuring faster delivery.

AdFixtures.title: Where We Transform Your Ideas into Effective Solutions
AdFixtures.description: At AD Fixtures, we turn your vision into reality with our state-of-the-art manufacturing capabilities and innovative design solutions.

Capability.description_metal: Our state-of-the-art metal factory transforms raw materials into custom solutions, tailored to your unique needs.
Capability.imageAlt_metal: Modern living room with metal furniture
Capability.description_millwork: Our advanced millwork facility crafts exquisite, bespoke pieces from raw wood, designed to enhance any space.
Capability.description_powder: In our cutting-edge powder coating facility, we deliver durable, vibrant finishes that elevate metal surfaces and ensure lasting quality.

WeAreCapable.title: Our Capabilities
WeAreCapable.versatileSolutionDescription: Our expertise extends beyond metal and wood, allowing us to source a wide range of materials to suit your project needs.
WeAreCapable.valueEngineeringDescription: We turn concepts into reality through value engineering, ensuring high quality at fair prices for our clients.

ProcessHub.title: A hub of creativity and craftsmanship
ProcessHub.description: Discover how our dedicated team collaborates to bring your concepts to life.

Process.title: Bring Your Idea to Life
Process.description: Our skilled team transforms your vision into a tangible prototype, turning concepts into reality.

step1.title: Understanding Your Needs
step1.description: We begin by assessing your requirements: specifications, construction details, preferred materials, and project budget. Your vision is our priority, and we're dedicated to crafting a tailored solution that meets all your expectations.

step2.title: Value Engineering
step2.description: We don't just produce goods; our meticulous value engineering has helped clients cut costs by up to 20% on past projects. We turn your ideas into reality, seamlessly blending innovation with cost-effectiveness.

step3.title: Precision in Production
step3.description: We deliver top-notch quality and precise lead times. Before any product leaves our facility, it undergoes rigorous quality checks to ensure it exceeds your expectations.

step4.title: Partnership Beyond Products
step4.description: We strive to build lasting partnerships with our clients. Our commitment goes beyond selling products; we're dedicated to supporting your success every step of the way.

WorksPortfolio.skechersDescription: For over 10 years, we have partnered with SKECHERS, successfully opening nearly 60 stores by providing tailored manufacturing services, including customized fixtures that enhance the customer experience.
WorksPortfolio.ispoDescription: Our tool-free assembly solution enables swift and efficient fixture construction, allowing for quick setups that streamline the store opening process and enhance operational efficiency.
WorksPortfolio.hokaDescription: We created vividly colored fixtures that bring a vibrant and energetic atmosphere to HOKA stores, complemented by easily movable display shelves that offer versatile presentation options for products.
WorksPortfolio.bvlgariDescription: In collaboration with GJ Decoration, we undertook the reconstruction of the exterior wall of the BVLGARI store in Taiwan, enhancing its visual appeal and aligning with the brand's luxury image.
WorksPortfolio.bmaDescription: To support BMA International in the UAE, we manufactured fixtures for three brands, successfully opening 150 stores that elevate their market presence and attract customers.
WorksPortfolio.aldoDescription: Partnering with ALDO for three generations of store fixtures, we take pride in contributing to their ongoing success with innovative designs that meet their evolving needs.

CallToActions.title: Explore Endless Possibilities Together
CallToActions.description: Leave your email below, and we'll reach out to explore how we can work together.
CallToActions.successMessage: Thank you! We'll be in touch soon.
